## Properties

| Property           | Attribute | Description                                                                                | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------ | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `tab` _(required)_ | `tab`     | Sets the related tab name, this name must match a `sage-tabpanel`'s tab property, required | `string` | `undefined` |
